slides.title: Welcome to SurePath

bodyParagraphs.text: SurePath is Guidewire's methodology for delivering successful insurance implementations.
Provides collateral, tooling, and standards for predictable, high-quality delivery
Applies to new implementations, cloud transitions, and all engagement models
All collateral freely available via Guidewire Community and Marketplace

slides.notes: SurePath is the umbrella name for Guidewire's delivery methodology encompassing standards, collateral, tools, and pre-built solutions that together create a predictable path to implementation success.
slides.narration: Welcome to the SurePath Overview. SurePath is Guidewire's comprehensive methodology for delivering successful insurance implementations.

slides.title: The SurePath Wheel

bodyParagraphs.text: SurePath is organized around four interconnected pillars:
Chart Your Path — Plan your journey with estimation tools, release planning, and scope alignment
Guide Your Delivery — Follow proven standards, best practices, and Cloud Assurance
Embed Quality — Build quality using automated checks, reference tests, and certifications
Drive Value — Align delivery to business objectives with value-focused implementation

slides.notes: The SurePath wheel shows four quadrants that work together throughout the entire implementation lifecycle. Each pillar has dedicated collateral, tools, and processes.
slides.narration: SurePath is organized around four pillars: Chart Your Path, Guide Your Delivery, Embed Quality, and Drive Value.

slides.title: SurePath Delivery Approach

bodyParagraphs.text: SurePath supports multiple engagement models and uses Agile delivery:
Project Types: New Cloud Implementation, Cloud Transition, Self-Managed to Cloud, Cloud Updates
Engagement Models: Guidewire-Led, Partner-Led, Customer-Led, and hybrid combinations
Agile release-based delivery with 1-week sprints early, 2-4 week sprints during development
Three guiding principles: Agile Delivery, Value-Driven Implementation, Success-Focused Execution

slides.notes: SurePath adapts to different project types and engagement models while maintaining consistent guiding principles. The Agile approach uses sprint-based execution with evolving cadence throughout the project.
slides.narration: SurePath supports multiple project types and engagement models with Agile delivery, guided by three principles: Agile, value-driven, and success-focused.

slides.title: Path to Success

bodyParagraphs.text: The Path to Success defines five major milestones:
Chart Your Course — Define scope, estimate effort, align on value
Mobilize & Execute — Set up teams, elaborate stories, build and test
Launch Your Solution — Deploy to production, migrate data, go live
Adopt & Evolve — Transition to operations, drive user adoption
Achieve Business Objectives — Realize committed business value

slides.notes: Each milestone maps to specific project lifecycle phases with defined entry/exit criteria. Quality is embedded through evaluation events, BDD practices, and Cloud Assurance assessments.
slides.narration: The Path to Success defines five milestones from charting your course through achieving business objectives.

slides.title: Guidewire Cloud Standards

bodyParagraphs.text: Cloud Standards define rules and best practices for implementations:
Implementation Standards — Best practices for configuring and customizing InsuranceSuite
Project and Procedure Standards — Guidelines for project management and release processes
Security Standards — Authentication, authorization, data protection, and compliance
Testing Standards — Test coverage, performance testing, and quality gates
Different standards apply by project type; all share security and testing baselines

slides.notes: Standards are mandatory for cloud implementations. They are published on Guidewire Community under the SurePath Knowledge topic. The Solution Enablement Team supports interpretation and execution.
slides.narration: Guidewire Cloud Standards cover implementation, project procedures, security, and testing. Different standards apply depending on project type.

slides.title: Cloud Assurance

bodyParagraphs.text: Cloud Assurance ensures implementations meet Guidewire Cloud Standards:
Implementation Assessments — Measure adherence to best practices and app performance
Feature Assessments — Measure SurePath use, alignment to base, and maintenance reduction
Phase Readiness Assessments — Evaluate entry/exit criteria before advancing phases
Solution Enablement Team — Supports standards interpretation; search Community first, then log Implementation Cases

slides.notes: Cloud Assurance is ongoing throughout the project, not a one-time check. The Solution Enablement Team maintains the knowledge base and helps interpret standards for specific contexts.
slides.narration: Cloud Assurance verifies implementations through implementation assessments, feature assessments, and phase readiness checks throughout the lifecycle.

slides.title: SurePath Collateral & Tooling

bodyParagraphs.text: SurePath provides collateral and tooling for every project phase:
Estimation: RFP Estimator, Release Planner, Conceptual Sprint Planner, Value Alignment Tools
Requirements: Training, MindMaps, System/Process Flows, User Story Cards, Integration Designs
Governance: Shared Responsibility Model, Lead Responsibilities, Activity-Level RACIs
Estimation accuracy improves: Introductory (±30%) → Workshop (±20%) → Inception (±10%)

slides.notes: SurePath's experience-based estimation tools provide proven accuracy that improves as more information is gathered. The RACI matrices define responsibility across all parties for every project activity.
slides.narration: SurePath provides estimation tools with proven accuracy, requirements collateral, and governance frameworks including shared responsibility models and detailed RACIs.

slides.title: Pre-Built Solutions

bodyParagraphs.text: Pre-built solutions lower implementation costs and accelerate delivery:
SurePath Content — Standardized, cloud-ready software driving adoption of Guidewire capabilities
Guidewire GO — 35+ pre-built product models in Marketplace (US, EMEA, Canada)
Guidewire Connect — Subscription-based common integrations (e-signatures, document production, payments, credit scoring)
All pre-built content is developed using Cloud Standards and certified for cloud deployment

slides.notes: Pre-built solutions are a major accelerator. SurePath Content provides standards-compliant configurations, Guidewire GO offers ready-to-deploy product models, and Guidewire Connect handles common integrations.
slides.narration: Pre-built solutions include SurePath Content, over 35 Guidewire GO product models, and Guidewire Connect subscription integrations — all cloud-certified.

slides.title: Guidewire Project Lifecycle — 7 Phases

bodyParagraphs.text: The Guidewire Project Lifecycle spans 3-24 months across seven phases:
Pre-Inception (1-6 wks) — Discovery, RFP estimate, workshops, readiness
Inception (2-8 wks) — Elaborate requirements, estimate backlog, training, value alignment
Sprint 0 (1-4 wks) — CI/CD setup, developer environment, story elaboration
Development (4-40 wks) — Plan sprints, build solution, performance testing
Stabilization (2-20 wks) — Regression, E2E, UAT, InfoSec test, dry runs
Deployment Prep (2-4 wks) — Finalize disaster recovery, deployment plans
Launch (varies) — Data migration, deployment, end-user training, hypercare

slides.notes: Each phase has defined activities, deliverables, entrance/exit criteria. Sprint cadence evolves from 1-week sprints in Sprint 0 to 2-4 week sprints during development. Same lifecycle applies to both self-managed and cloud.
slides.narration: The seven-phase lifecycle spans 3 to 24 months: Pre-Inception, Inception, Sprint 0, Development, Stabilization, Deployment Prep, and Launch.

slides.title: Self-Managed vs Cloud Implementation

bodyParagraphs.text: Both follow the same seven phases — the difference is infrastructure responsibility:
Self-Managed — Customer configures, integrates, upgrades, tests, and deploys to own infrastructure
Guidewire Cloud — Cloud Operations provides and supports infrastructure; deploys customer configuration
Cloud adds teams: Customer Success, Cloud Assurance, Cloud Operations, Production Services
Project Delivery Assessments (phase readiness + implementation) ensure quality throughout

slides.notes: The fundamental lifecycle is the same, but cloud shifts infrastructure responsibility to Guidewire and adds specialized teams. This lets implementation teams focus on business configuration.
slides.narration: Self-managed and cloud implementations follow the same lifecycle. Cloud shifts infrastructure to Guidewire and adds specialized support teams.

slides.title: Phase Transitions

bodyParagraphs.text: Each phase has defined entrance and exit criteria:
Entrance Criteria — Must be met before a phase can start
Exit Criteria — Must be met to complete a phase; no outstanding items
When criteria are not met, teams can:
Adjust Staffing — Add resources to meet objectives
Obtain Additional Funding — Request budget support
Modify Project Schedule — Adjust timelines
Mitigation Plan — Reduce impact, renegotiate criteria

slides.notes: Phase transitions are formal checkpoints. Exit criteria from one phase may become entrance criteria for the next when phases overlap. Four structured remediation options address criteria gaps.
slides.narration: Each phase has entrance and exit criteria. When criteria aren't met, teams can adjust staffing, obtain funding, modify schedule, or create a mitigation plan.

slides.title: Teams & Key Roles

bodyParagraphs.text: The Guidewire ecosystem provides multiple layers of support:
Core Team — Customer, Guidewire, and Partner resources
Extended Services — Implementation (onsite/remote), specialized services (data migration, integrations, education)
Advisory/Assurance — Implementation management, delivery assessments, value alignment
Global Enablement — Incident handling, product development access, situation management
Key roles: Delivery Manager, Functional Architect, Technical Architect
SurePath Role RACIs define responsibilities for all teams across every project phase

slides.notes: The staffing model shows concentric rings of support around the core team. SurePath provides detailed RACI matrices introduced during Pre-Inception and reviewed before each phase.
slides.narration: The Guidewire ecosystem provides core team, extended services, advisory, and global enablement layers, with detailed RACI matrices defining responsibilities.

slides.title: Organizational Change Management

bodyParagraphs.text: OCM is a critical ingredient for successful implementations:
Drives organizational readiness to transition people, processes, and strategies
Guidewire provides collateral and guidance; SI partners handle OCM execution
Customer workstreams: Program Management, OCM, Agency Compliance, Legacy Cutover, Testing, Development, Training
Targets both company users and agent users of Guidewire systems

slides.notes: OCM is frequently underestimated. While Guidewire provides collateral, the actual execution must be handled by the customer or SI partner. Successful implementations always include strong OCM.
slides.narration: Organizational Change Management drives readiness for transition. Guidewire provides collateral while SI partners handle execution across program management, compliance, and training workstreams.

slides.title: Chapter Summary

bodyParagraphs.text: Now you know that SurePath...
Enables the Path to Success for all project types — new implementations, cloud transitions, all engagement models
Sets up projects for success with collateral and tools — predictable results with embedded quality
Ensures teams focus on delivering value — aligned to strategic business objectives
Accelerates implementations — leveraging pre-built content, Guidewire GO, and Guidewire Connect
The 7-phase Project Lifecycle provides structured assessments, clear roles, and OCM support throughout

slides.notes: Students should now be able to explain SurePath, identify its four pillars, describe the seven lifecycle phases, and understand the team structure and role of OCM.
slides.narration: In summary, SurePath enables success for all project types with collateral, tools, pre-built solutions, and a seven-phase lifecycle with structured assessments and clear roles.
